flawed_nl_solution:
5 hours in the studio is the same as 5 * 60 = <<5*60=3000>>3000 minutes.
To record all of his songs, Elvis takes 12 * 10 = <<12*10=120>>120 minutes.
After editing and recording 3000 - 120 - 30 = <<3000-120-30=2850>>2850 minutes are left to write all of his songs.
Songwriting therefore took 2850 / 10 = <<2850/10=285>>285 minutes per song.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
